articles.content:
If you haven't received your $600 stimulus check, there's good news: You may still be able to claim the money when you file your taxes.
The second $600 stimulus checks authorized by Congress in Dece… [+3422 chars]

articles.title: National Margarita Day 2021 brings drink specials and tequila deals for Margarita Monday at Chili's and more - USA TODAY
articles.description: Feb. 22 is National Margarita Day or Margarita Monday. But the made-up day is different amid the COVID pandemic. Chili's has several margarita deals.
articles.content:
You don't have to wait until 5 o'clock to kick off National Margarita Day.
Wochit
National Margarita Day also is Margarita Monday this year.
